text:
@cnnbrk Eau de Corona' a unisex scent.£70

Top notes:hydrogen sulphide (rotten eggs),garlic & bad breath. 
Base notes:sewage,body odour & rotting flesh. 

GUARANTEE:KEEPS OTHERS 2M AWAY. NO COVID19.

As loss of smell is one of the symptoms of COVID19,RUN FAST if someone gets too close
